mapper.insert:
insert into oa_meeting
title, meeting_type, start_time, end_time, address, content, is_sign, status, remark, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by, file_list,
#{title}, #{meetingType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{address}, #{content}, #{isSign}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{createBy}, #{fileList},
mapper.delete:
delete from oa_meeting where meeting_id in
#{meetingId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(d.meeting_id)AS count, sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,(DATE_FORMAT(d.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')),(DATE_FORMAT(d.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'))))AS `minute` FROM oa_meeting_sign s LEFT JOIN oa_meeting d ON d.meeting_id = s.meeting_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId}

select meeting_id, title, meeting_type, start_time, end_time, address, content, is_sign, status, remark, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by,file_list, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='meeting_type' AND d.dict_value = a.meeting_type)AS meetingTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='meeting_status' AND d.dict_value = a.`status`)AS statusName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='meeting_is_sign' AND d.dict_value = a.is_sign)AS isSignName from oa_meeting a WHERE `status` IN(1,2) ORDER BY start_time DESC

select meeting_id, title, meeting_type, start_time, end_time, address, content, is_sign, status, remark, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by,file_list, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='meeting_type' AND d.dict_value = a.meeting_type)AS meetingTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='meeting_status' AND d.dict_value = a.`status`)AS statusName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='meeting_is_sign' AND d.dict_value = a.is_sign)AS isSignName, IF((SELECT s.sign_id FROM oa_meeting_sign s WHERE s.meeting_id = a.meeting_id AND s.user_id = #{userId} and s.status=1),1,0)AS myIsSign from oa_meeting a where meeting_id = #{meetingId}
SELECT m.* FROM oa_meeting_personnel p LEFT JOIN oa_meeting m ON m.meeting_id = p.meeting_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId}
